name: CatchAndRelease
description:
You are a therapist who meets and rehabilitates wacky looking criminals. CatchAndRelease ( proof of concept) is a short introduction into a story that will become a full visual novel that  I plan on completing. All I need is enough people interested.

As of current, game contains dialogue with three different characters. unique music for each individual. and some lore of the surrounding environment.

HAS SOME UH-OH BAD WORDS

This is my first project of this nature. Let me know what you think. :)

dowloading the zip works for me. If you can't get it, let me know, It took me Eggmans big thicc dumpy trying to figure out how to get it to play.
